issue.title: [CI][Python] Spark integration failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14381](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14381). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Both spark-master and spark-3.0 nightly builds are failing:

master: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3938861610#step:7:9237
branch-3.0: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3938887794#step:7:8917

We should also test against branch-3.2

cc `[~bryanc]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14381?focusedCommentId=17430553) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Keep it as blocker until we don't figure out the origin of the issues.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14381?focusedCommentId=17430586) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Probably introduced by https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/1229260f2b90e94fb824b23b8ff9a0b037d3b92c

Still verifying.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14381?focusedCommentId=17430813) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11465
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11465>
